attributes.action: Avoid the increase in the minimum wage of the worked visa in spring 2024
attributes.additional_details:
I think this petition is unfair for the people who wants to work legally paying taxes and having good opportunities. 
It seems a really harsh way to get rid of the immigration.
Eliminate or to low the increase in the minimum wage for the worked visa, since it is not even a reasonable salary for British citizens to get 38k a year.
attributes.background: Having a salary of 22/24k a year is more than reasonable to pay for NHS and the majority of British citizens do not earn 38k a year even if there is 2 of them working in the same family.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Cancel increase to minimum income requirement for Skilled Worker and Family visa: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652619

Don’t increase the income requirement for family visas to £38,700: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652602
